sect2.title: Introduction to KOffice
sect2.para: KOffice is the integrated office suite for KDE.

sect2.title: Additional downloads
sect2.para: KOffice also has many internationalization packages in the form of: koffice-i18n-xx-&koffice-version;.tar.bz2 where the xx is a two to five letter code for the country covered. The sizes of these files range from about 289 KB to 408 KB.
